722694f.text:
Riverside Drive. Entrance at 72nd St. looking north. William 1. McAlpin supervising engineer.
Sept. 30, 1879
Deposited uith NPL by NC Park Dept. 1931

722696f.text:
Identification: Hudson River monument, Riverside Drive &
72d St. Designed by Allen G. Newman, Sc.
Cast by Jno. Williams, Inc.
Date: 1909
Photographer: A.B.Sogart, 80 E. 14th St.

722695f.text:
Riverside Drive and Park, north fromm West 72nd Street. The spacious home at the right is the Charles M. Schwab mansion. This occupies the entire block bounded by the Drive, West End Avenue, between 73rd and 74th Streets. Beyond, are the 12-story Lombard (erected 1907- 8), No. 332 West End Avenue and the massive Apthorpe Apartments (erected 1908), No. 2201-17 Broadway. Construction
of the latter date this view.
18o9  198e-5 18O094
Gift of I. N. P. Stokes
NleWvEow
